entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
